example.text: Stolen children. Rape. Beheadings. Torture. Mass executions. The list of unspeakable atrocities committed by Putin and his henchmen in Ukraine goes on. I urge [[user]] Austin to use the authority Congress provided for sharing critical evidence of atrocities with the ICC. [[url]]

Always a pleasure to welcome my House colleagues to the Senate for lunch & conversation! Discussing priorities for Illinoisans across districts helps us toward our shared goal of vibrant & thriving communities. [[url]]

May is Mental Health Awareness Month and there's no better time to remind ourselves of the importance of it, especially for our youth. Thanks to the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act, [[user]] has awarded more than $280 million to help meet students' mental health needs.
I know what is happening there from press reports. Their treatment of women is abominable.
It’s past time for a Supreme Court ethical code of conduct. If Chief Justice Roberts won’t act on ethics reform, Congress must.

Stolen children. Rape. Beheadings. Torture. Mass executions. The list of unspeakable atrocities committed by Putin and his henchmen in Ukraine goes on. I urge [[user]] Austin to use the authority Congress provided for sharing critical evidence of atrocities with the ICC. [[url]]
